supportDesc.support: A single sheet mounted on a page of a large volume. Paper, thick and rough unclear

collation.ruling: Impossible to establish, though the quality of the writing suggests that there was some ruling

decoDesc.decoNote: A pen and ink drawing of a hand in the correct position for the three-fingered sign of the Cross, with a basic description of this, all surrounded by a scrollwork border.

scribe.note: Semiuncial (2-3mm line, 5 interline space; a few lines within the border are written in letters 5 mm of height); with regular diacritics; both it and the border show very strong influence of the printed original from which they were copied.

msContents.summary: Instructions on how to make the sign of the Cross; The contents of this MS are derived from the book, printed Moscow, 1665-6; it would appear, though, that it was not copied directly from the book, but from a printed flysheet containing this portion of the text and the hand, which it reproduces faithfully. A copy of this flysheet is to be found in Sloane MS 2910, f. 4, which also belonged to Kämpfer.

msItemStruct.title: Указания как да се прави кръстен знак
msItemStruct.note: Copied from Skrizhal' (printed Moscow 1665-6), f. ѱ҃о г and f. ѱ҃чд

sampleText.incipit: Сице долженъ кїиждо бл҃гочестивы хрⷭтїанинъ воѡбражати насебѣ крⷭ҃ъ: первѣе совокꙋпиⷮперваѧ Три свои персты за ст҃ꙋю трⷪицꙋ тѣмже иг҃лемъ знаменающесѧ во имѧ оц҃а ис҃на ист҃го д҃ха. истинно ѹбѡ есть ꙗ апⷭлъское есть ист҃ыхъ оц҃ь преданїе ѹтверждаетсѧ свидѣтелствоⷨ премꙋдрагѡ Дамаскина монаха, ѵподїакона истꙋдита скрижаль, листь, ѱ҃ог.
sampleText.explicit: покоримжесѧ паче вси вкꙋпѣ древнемꙋ преданию, ѿ ст҃ыхъ апⷭлъ, ис҃ыхъ оц҃ъ преданномꙋ, еже треми персты первыми воѡбражати налицѣ нашемъ чⷭтны крⷭтъ.

history.provenance: The volume in which this roll is mounted forms part of the notes of the traveler Engelbert Kämpfer (1651-1716), ranging in subject from date palms to acupuncture. In the earlier parts of the volume are some rough maps and views of Russian towns executed by Kämpfer.
